title: Making grass silage
creator_credit: Margaret Thomson, Great Britain. Ministry of Agriculture and Realist Films
brief_description: Shows methods used by British farmers for making grass silage. Covers the whole process, from mowing to use as fodder. Demonstrates methods of packing a silo, adding molasses, and ensuring proper temperature to mature the silage. Shows also use of a pit - an alternative device to a silo.
